website_summaries.verdict: This functional, tote-style PVC bag holds handbag essentials as well as a stadium blanket, snacks, and a water bottle.
pros: Meets NFL and PGA tournament guidelines
Fits phone, camera, water bottle, hat, and other essentials
cons: Straps can rip off over time with moderate use

website_summaries.verdict: This is a sturdy bag that conveniently zips to ensure items are kept together safely.
pros: Tote conveniently zips closed to protect items
Straps are sturdily attached to bag
Roomy design yet still fits under most stadium and airline seats for easy storage
Lightweight design makes this bag easy to travel with, yet it can hold a substantial amount of weight

customer_reviews.title: Great stadium bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag to take into stadium that requires clear bag & no purse. Straps are a great length. Bottom has no support so I cut cardboard & decorated it with polka-dot paper. I Added vinyl lettering & a hot pink tassel to give it some personality.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Survived a heavy-duty breaking in!!
customer_reviews.text: Well this product did the job! Stuffed with protein bars, apples, a camera, a scarf, chargers, a TP roll ( full ), a wallet, a rolled up stadium blanket, and a large water bottle, it was dropped, kicked, stepped on and ZIPPED AND UNZIPPED for 10.5 hours, broken in on the March on Washington. ( And it's ready for more! ) 😀
customer_reviews.author: M. Calambro

customer_reviews.title: This item is very cheaply constructed. I am required ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is very cheaply constructed. I am required to have a clear lunch bag for work. I used it for less than one month, for only my lunch with nothing heavy in it and the handle rippled off while I was wearing it. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Emily Foster

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I've Had mine for a week exactly and the strap broke today. I use it for work and it's only had six days of use. While the size is good I don't recommend it if you plan to use the straps for more the show.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unravels
customer_reviews.text: Ok. When I first got this it was perfect I thought. It appeared sturdy. And was what I needed for work. But after a few days of use the seams began to unravel. The plastic itself seems very sturdy but the sewing job on the seams is not. I can’t use it anymore because it is just falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy about this purchase: good price, practical and roomy tote for my daily use. I carried it with me on the plane with my toddler, and I take it to the library. It can held a large A4 size file holder, a couple of 1 liter size water bottles, as well as some snacks and makeup bags and so on. I am very happy about this purchase. I used it once last summer, and I start to use it pretty much everyday for the past couple of months, a practical tote.
customer_reviews.author: Leuxmama

customer_reviews.title: Exploding Zipper
customer_reviews.text: I may have rated this better if the zipper housing hadn't disintegrated when I went to unzip the bag for the first time. There wasn't enough housing left to tie a string to or try to close in any way, thus making the bag useless. The rest of the bag, however, seemed to be put together better but since I can't use it in the manner for which I purchased it the overall rating is low.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Big mom sized bag
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the Rose Bowl game worked great. Held 2 bottles of water, wallet,shirt, sunglasses case and still had lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: heideo

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED!! purchased this bag cuz it has an adjustable strap...recieved bag and no adjustable strap
customer_reviews.author: marsha marsha marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: I went to my twin nieces college graduation and they had made us aware that we had to have clear purses only to be able to enter the stadium. I bought several of these so I would have extra for other family members and good thing I did because I was the only one who bought any. They were the perfect size to hold all of the essentials I needed including 2 bottles of water and a large camera. My niece used one for a diaper bag. Good quality and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Hudson

customer_reviews.title: I got in, and I like the bag too
customer_reviews.text: I went to RISE women’s conference in FL and the Hertz arena required clear bag to get in. This bag was the one the fit the dimensions set by the arena. It fit everything I needed for the time I was in arena. Our work book, reusable water bottle, snack items, and my ziplock bag of personal items, and still had plenty of room for more. I am also one who is very picky about the length of shoulder straps and this one has straps that were perfect and I could even wear it messenger style with the adjustable strap. This was a great purchase for the requirement and the price was fantastic too.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for football games.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. You can fit a whole lot in there. I am also able to take the bag to football games which is pretty nice. Seems to be durable, and the zippers do not have that cheap feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean up. Great for getting through security
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for us to use at a concert event. Worked wonderful. 1 we filled with ice bottles & water bottles, so we didn't have to pay $10 for a bottle of water. We gave the kids each their own bag. They used them for snacks & all of the event items they purchased. The bags worked great! Got through security fast, easy, & painless. We even had a whole can of beer dumped (by accident) all over 2 of our bags & when we got home they were so easy to just wipe clean with some Lysol wipes. Definitely worth the money. Cleaned them out & hung them up for our next concert.
customer_reviews.author: Williams Family

customer_reviews.title: Another report of a broken strap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag based on the positive reviews. Oh well. While it fit the requirements for where it was being carried, the strap broke in the first week. We purchase clear bags so that the contents can be readily viewed. If you think about it, though, you don't need to have a clear bag if the strap breaks and its contents spilled on the floor, right?
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Sue Carolla

customer_reviews.title: Clear bag does the job
customer_reviews.text: For a clear bag, this works fine. In fact, I ended up using it for more than just sporting events. The bag works well for traveling with children. We can see who has what and tell if anything has been left behind with just a glance. This is a good idea when privacy is not an issue if you have things like sunscreen, a hairbrush and tissues or children’s items. We’re on our own for personal items like feminine supplies or prescriptions. The bag has sturdy handles and zipper.
customer_reviews.author: ErinLeigh

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have used clear bags for work for quite a while. This is the cheapest one I have purchased and it came very fast! Large enough to fit just about anything and then some.. lol With that being said.. you get what you pay for, the plastic is thin and starting to fold and make little holes. I’ve had it for 3 weeks and will probably use for another month before I have to buy another one. If you’re using it less often, for the beach or taking to stadium maybe, this would be a great buy but for every day use it doesn’t last as long as other more expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were purchased for game day use at Williams Brice ...
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for game day use at Williams Brice Stadium and University of South Carolina due to a new clear bag policy for all athletic events. Can't say enough about these - they are amazingly HUGE and allow you to carry any and all things that you might have in your purse, plus a sealed bottle of water, rain gear and/or a stadium blanket. LOTS of storage space for all that you would need for any event. You cannot beat the price either. Don't hesitate or look for something locally, the quantity and price surpass what you spend time riding around looking for and won't be of this size/caliber.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend it for anyone looking for a decent bag for ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this purse for a Taylor Swift concert in order to protect my cell phone and merch in case there was rain. Don't let the cheap price fool you, this bag does the job. It might not be the cutest of bags, but it is very functional. I was able to put my wallet, a camera, two cell phones, car keys, and still have plenty of room for the Taylor Swift merch I purchased. I would highly recommend it for anyone looking for a decent bag for a stadium concert or sporting event.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bort

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NFL games
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Exactly what is described. Unfortunately you NEED these if you have children and want to go to a NFL game. But cheaper then buying it out front of the stadium! Fun story... took my son for his three month birthday, and didn’t even make to kickoff before he had a diaper explosion. All over his jersey, my jersey, and the carrier. We spent the first quarter in the bathroom washing stuff, second quarter in a bar, in the stadium, watching the game on a tv. We left at half time. The bag worked great though Lol
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: A lot of room and held up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a ton of room. I ordered to go to a basketball game and I took my son so I had to take extra clothes, diapers, wipes, and my wallet, it also fit my jacket and his jacket. I am super impressed with this bag. It held up nicely and the adjustable strap is a plus to carry as a cross body, or the handle straps are long enough to carry as a shoulder bag. I had zero issues at the gate and I would 10/10 recommend this bag. I am very happy I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tnmom2017

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make it through one football game! Update below 9/23/2019
customer_reviews.text: 9/23/2019 Great customer service. Quickly sent a replacement but I was unable to use it right away. I am looking forward to using it soon. If the bag tears again, I will make adjustments to my review. Unfortunately I used the bag one time for a football game and there is already a tear at the top. Of the stitching hadn’t separated, creating a hole, the size would be great for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: MJB KTown

customer_reviews.title: it is an NFL clear bag...that's it don't expect more
customer_reviews.text: it is a plastic bag that is exactly as described. Don't expect style. Don't expect it to be rugged. It is for taking stuff to a game and meeting the stupid clear bag requirements. I still put my "personnal" items in a small cosmetic bag inside the bag and have not been questioned. I use the bag to hold my wallet, keys, camera, hand warmers, and rain poncho. I miss my old NFL team canvas bag where I could carry my blanket, towel, suncreen. Now I just bring those in seperately.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The clear plastic is cracking at the corners with every day use. There are now several holes in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Slay

customer_reviews.title: it seems like the bag will not fit anything and you'll feel ...
customer_reviews.text: At work, we are required to bring clear bags. I bought this bag to store my gym clothes and tennis shoes whenever I go to the gym straight after work. When you unpackage the tote, it seems like the bag will not fit anything and you'll feel deceived for a moment. The bag fits my tennis shoes, work out clothes, towel and two shaker bottles with room to spare. Great quality. Will be purchasing a spare soon.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Britton

customer_reviews.title: Good for light use.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I am irritated by stadium requirements for a clear plastic bag. Six dollars delivered to your door is a good price for something to use specifically to carry your small personal items to sporting events. The plastic rings and clips are cheap looking and feeling. Immediately cut a piece of cardboard to fit the bottom. The bag is a good size, but I will be careful of weight. If you need a daily user, I would recommend you go with another bag.
customer_reviews.author: R. Krassa

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for an air show, and was surprised that it’s not as flimsy as I thought it would be (considering the price). I packed it full but it didn’t feel like I’m overloading its weight capacity. The straps were perfect length for me to carry it on my shoulder, and the long strap came in handy when I needed more freedom to do activities.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K.

customer_reviews.title: A great buy, does the job well
customer_reviews.text: The bag meets our college stadium's new standards for entry into events. Straps are sturdy and it should last several football seasons. I chose this particular bag because it has a zipper which I find essential in keeping items contained inside the bag. It's often set on the ground at my feet when seated, and it gets knocked around. I also chose it because it's not expensive. I bought a few of them, so I can lend to friends who may attend some games with me. It's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Mom approved bag so you know it's good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing on behalf of my mom, who uses this for her work bag. She works at Costco and they are required to have a clear bag to bring in any personal items. This is her second one! She really enjoys the quality. It's not too big or too small. She also likes that she can wear it over her shoulder or carry it like a tote. She basically just takes her usual purse stuff and puts in this bag. It's really a great investment bag, because you can take it into stadiums and concert venues! But my mom uses this bag every single day and it has held up just fine. Everyone should have one! For everyday or events!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Needed for Concert - Sturdy. Shoulder strap was a plus.
customer_reviews.text: Its ridiculous that we have to carry everything in see-thru containers now. But, the venue would not allow purses larger than a clutch and we needed to carry water-bottles and rain wear, etc. Not to mention my wallet and make-up bag. So we ordered this and it served its purpose well. Sturdy. Shoulder-strap came in handy. And it was PACKED! Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: BASHA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for day at the stadium
customer_reviews.text: This bag holds SO MUCH STUFF — everything you need for the stadium, with room to spare. I packed a thin blanket, an extra layer for everyone, snacks, water bottles, sunscreen, three pairs of sunglasses, a hat!!! The strap isn’t terribly comfortable with the bag loaded down like that, but for one day at the stadium it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Villain

customer_reviews.title: Great stadium diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a diaper bag for a recent NFL game, and it worked out great! We had enough space for diapers, wipes, noise canceling headphones, snacks, & a few teethers, plus my wallet & a bottle of water! We don't plan on using this on a regular basis, but for the night we needed it, the quality was more than fine. From a previous review, I added a cardboard piece to the bottom of the bag to add some support on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Practical clear tote
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag a lot. I do not use it for going to stadium - I rarely ever go to stadiums - but I use it almost on a daily basis. What I like about this tote is when I am in a hurry and I am not sure if I pack this and that I do not have to waste my time going through the bag - I can see it CLEARLY.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.  Lasted less than 6 weeks of basic use
customer_reviews.text: Needed a clear bag for a place I was working for two months. Only had the bag for about 4 weeks before one of the handles ripped away from the plastic. Ended up knotting the strap to the body piece of fabric and less than 2 weeks later the other handle came apart at the plastic as well. Luckily I did not need this item after the short work period... would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Meghan M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's a big bag so I can hold a lot of stuff in it, and the straps are durable. The shoulder strap is adjustable which is great. It does not have any pockets though but I knew that when I purchased it, I just didn't realize how much I could have used a pocket on the inside or even one on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great stadium bag
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this bag as our local prison has a plant sale each year, and you can't carry a purse. Hopefully, I will be able to use this bag to hold my cash and checks and id. With the virus, the event was cancelled, but I'll be ready next year.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: hard to hide my “outside food”
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to bring your own Coke and Milkduds into a football game, this is not the bag for you. My wife did get to skip the “search your bag” table since it takes about 2 seconds to scan it visually. Works great as a bag but horrible if you are trying to “beat the system”
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clear bag for my work. For the price it's seems to be working fine for the past couple of months. I have placed two 60 oz. ice tea bottles in it and it's held the weight just fine. Seems to get a little brittle in the severe cold, but for just a couple dollars I was pleasantly surprised it hasn't ripped yet. I will update review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Cropper

customer_reviews.title: cute and helpful, but not ideal for daily use
customer_reviews.text: i used this as a daily bag for my work items, keys, etc. and all the little keys and other pointy items i dropped in there did start poking holes in the plastic after a handful of weeks. i can't recommend you use this for those rougher/sharper items, but i think any other stuff would be fine in it for more frequent use
customer_reviews.author: Wick Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a good rating because of it looking well made. I haven't actually had the opportunity to use it yet, but I've got it when I need it the next time I go to a stadium that requires clear bags. I had to borrow one the last time I went.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect and arrived just on time so I could go to the soccer game at the Atlanta stadium. This bag was perfect in size had a strap so I could carry it over my shoulder if I wanted. And went through security very quickly and easily and we'll use it again when I need to go back to the stadium.
customer_reviews.author: L. Britton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work
customer_reviews.text: My work requires us to have see through bags and purses only. They provide one for all employees but it's to small to fit one water bottle. This bag has been perfect. I can't fit my keys, wallet, food, 4-5 water bottles and that is only filling up 1/4th of the bag!! It could easily hold about 15-20 water bottles if that is all I had to put in it. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works for entrance to events that require a see through bag to enter.
customer_reviews.text: This bag meets NFL Stadium requirements. I like it because it is good sized and will hold quite a lot. It has the Addis advantage, since it is clear, of looking for an item you put in the bag. You can locate it from the outside and don’t have to go digging trough it as you would with an opaque bag.
customer_reviews.author: S.T. Holloman

customer_reviews.title: TEARS QUICKLY... WASTE OF $$
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Terrible!! NOT STURDY AT ALL. I bought this for work (I work at the airport). After 4 days I started seeing holes by the seams, at a full week my pens and coins were falling out so I returned and had replaced through Amazon. I'm only a few weeks into my replacement and once again same thing. I had to buy masking tape and have been sealing all the holes which are now in the bottom corners, along the seams, in the sides and at the top. DO NOT BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are not accurate as it does not have the longer detachable strap which is what I had wanted. But it's cheap and can otherwise serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great for NFL games!
customer_reviews.text: I got this specifically for an upcoming NFL football game I'm going to. This bag meets their requirements perfectly. It is sturdy and well constructed, with taped seams and a zipper that looks sturdy. Long straps that will make it easy to carry over a shoulder. So great to order this on Amazon for less than $7 instead of looking all over town for something similar.
customer_reviews.author: robin-m

customer_reviews.title: Clear sturdy stadium approved bag at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clear bag to carry into a graduation ceremony that requires such bags. Only used it once. It held quite a few personal items, an umbrella, a large program and a water bottle quite easily. Clear vinyl seemed quite sturdy & saw no evidence of stretching and had good sturdy handles. Was exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent for NFL security
customer_reviews.text: Used for a concert at Broncos stadium and got through security with zero problems. We fit 4 bottles of water and a jacket and snacks in it and had room to spare. seems sturdy and fairly durable. We go to about one game a year so I think it will last us for years. Cant beat the price and value. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: N. J.

customer_reviews.title: Best $6 ive spent on a plastic bag!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is the best bag you will get. I can fit a ton of items in it, it's super durable, and even if it tore after 3 or 4 uses I would definitely buy the same bag again! Exactly as described, similar bags cost 4-5 times as much inside the stadiums. The straps are very sturdy, I've walked several miles with this on my shoulder easily carrying 5+ lbs in its and it's going strong.
customer_reviews.author: erika a.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and complies with all stadium standards
customer_reviews.text: When this first arrived I was a bit hesitant at the quality but so far this thing has been a pack mule! Appearances dont matter as we have packed this thing to capacity and beyond and it has held up very well. I was a bit annoyed having to purchase one so i obviously went with the lowest price but the quality far exceeds what you may expect.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and quick arrival
customer_reviews.text: I had to work the 2020 NFL Super Bowl in Miami and this is the only bag allowed inside. I didn’t realize this until last minute so I ordered this product very late however still received it a day before my shift! Definitely a life saver. Very roomy bag and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for going to a game with a clear bag policy, and it came in handy for a color run since I needed to carry some things. I have the black straps so the colored powders may stain other colors, but it was nice to just be able to wipe this bag right off!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Had no problems getting through security
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product we went to a football game and I needed this for me and my kids. I had a few people asking me if I bought it there because they couldnt bring the bags they had.It came in handy and I had no problems with security.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica bollinger

customer_reviews.title: Good Tote!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, strong yet lightweight tote fits a lot of stuff. And it fits under most seats. We enjoying using it and it makes it so easy getting through the gates because inspectors can readily see everything. These days everyone still needs to read rules before going to a concert, even if you've been there many times before.
customer_reviews.author: Marion P

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stadium requirements
customer_reviews.text: I like the clear bag for the purpose for which it was purchased. We will be attending a music fest in a month or two and the stadium which will be hosting nightly concerts requires you carry only clear, see through bags of a certain size. This bag fits the NFL's stadium requirements so will be accompanying me to the concerts each night. It seems sturdy and roomy. Only little inconvenience is trying to get the zipper closed around the somewhat squared corners but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: It’s lasted me 2 years already
customer_reviews.text: I have come back to this product page so many times , because we are required to have clear bags at my job. My bag is the only one out of 50 or so people that has not broken apart or straps falling off. I’ve actually owned this for almost 2 years now and am just making the review after coming here to copy the link!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Well made
customer_reviews.text: I hate having to use a clear plastic bag. But this one is strong, the right size for standard documents and folders, it stays clear, and it takes a beating without scratching up or splitting. I load it pretty full and the straps handle it well.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal J. DiTomasso

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: The price is great, so is the size and the fact that you can zip it closed. Unfortunately, I have been using it for work and today I noticed about 3" on a corner seam have busted out. Admittedly, I am a bit rough on the thing and I can't fault the construction. Light duty or stadium use, great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Holven

customer_reviews.title: Already used it at a baseball game and was very happy with the size and sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use for USC games because the stadium doesn't allow purses or back packs any more. Already used it at a baseball game and was very happy with the size and sturdiness. Ended up holding my jacket, wallet, two small bottles of water, cell phone and sun block with enough room to add odds and ends that my companions added. This is going to be my "go to" bag for any future outings.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Harvey

customer_reviews.title: good quality and a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Holds an insane amount of stuff. I bought this to attend a football game with my small children. It fit all of our diapers, changes of clothes, snacks, water bottles and m personal items. Good quality, held up well and arrived in one day!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gruel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NFL games
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take to an NFL game and it worked out perfect. I was able to take everything i needed, and my luck it rained while we were there so I was able to put our phones in the bag and keep watching the game.
customer_reviews.author: christy canaday

customer_reviews.title: Great for Baby Food
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this bag! I was looking for something that I could put my infant daughter’s milk and bottle heating egg into when bringing her to my family’s for babysitting. It’s easy to clean, see-thru (so I can easily see if I’m forgetting to add something), and large enough to fit several quarts of milk into for those weekend visits.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Robison

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I recently attended a wonderful conference that required all belongings to be in see-through bags. This worked well. I've also found it to be helpful as a knitting bag. I can see what project I am working on and if I have the accessories needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ilo H. Tefft

customer_reviews.title: The other bag is fine so I assume it is defective
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 bags, opened them up for a football game tomorrow and one of the bags has one long handle and one short handle. The other bag is fine so I assume it is defective, return window has passed as and I didn't open the packaging until needed so too bad for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good for concerts
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a concert because it was required instead of regular backpack. I like the option of handles or shoulder strap. I don’t know how durable it will be because I probably won’t use it that often. Held a lot of stuff. Decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Snt.Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at a great price
customer_reviews.text: We only used this bag for 1 game. Ordered because our previous free bag was splitting and falling apart. This bag is much better with shoulder strap and zip closures. A big improvement from a wide open bag.
customer_reviews.author: J. Towner

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: bigger than i expected but i was able to go through security without a problem, i was going into a stadium (solider field) its not the prettiest bag but it will get the job done so its worth the price also it rained the day of the concert I went to and it kept my things in the bag dry so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Gisella

customer_reviews.title: Seems Ideal
customer_reviews.text: This bag seems perfect for my needs. I will be participating in a political march soon, and had to have a clear bag that meets these dimensions. This bag is plenty large enough to carry my day's worth of food, water, antiseptic wipes, scarf, hat, rain poncho, or whatever! It seems sturdy, and I love that it has a zipper and handles long enough to carry over the shoulder. Hopefully, it will hold up under all the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Highspirits1964

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and simple bag for a great price. I use it for the beach or boat, does great job and I don't have to dig to find my stuff. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sutcu

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Mine didnt come with the side strap. It ripped after 3 months use, at the seam at the bottom.i lost things out of the tear before I realized it. My cell phone crack from sliping out. Definitely not well made
customer_reviews.author: AKEMI

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Gor this bag fir work because i work in a warehouse and we need ti have see thru baggage. Large enough for pretty much everything. Straps are thick and long. So they don't cut into your shoulders. Plus it was really cheap
customer_reviews.author: forbiddenchocolate

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, roomy and just the ticket for stadium events
customer_reviews.text: I needed one of these for a recent concert. For the price I was pleased w/the size of the bag and the durability. I was worried that the straps would detach but I managed to carry 5 small bottles of water, a thin blanket and several snacks inside my tote. I don't expect this to last forever, but it will come in handy whenever I need to use a clear carryall.
customer_reviews.author: gracep

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: We bought our bag for football games as it is the perfect size, but it is cheaply made. One side had a hole before we even used it. After 4 games or so it developed a hole in the bottom. It looks like both seems weren't really sewn in.
customer_reviews.author: jobew

customer_reviews.title: worked to get into strict sport stadium security
customer_reviews.text: this is the third bag i got to get into security for my wife. i got backpacks for me and my son. has pockets and adjustable straps. works great!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for TSA and Air Travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for one reason: quick carry for TSA and airplanes. I load all my must-haves in this clear plastic carry-all bag; ID, wallet, tissue, snacks, lip balm, etc. I pull this clear bag from my luggage before I stuff into the overhead bin and I'm set for my flight. It's convenient and wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Holland

customer_reviews.title: It's uhhhh.. a bag?
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what the description says: a plastic bag that's prefect for NFL games, PGA events or concerts at outdoor venues. It seems pretty study, although I won't even guess as to how long it will last. All I know is, the missus and I have gone to one golf tournament and three concerts with it, and it still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cofer

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and shape
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today, I ordered 4. I love them already. I bought them to help organize my stuff since I am downsizing. They are perfect for anything because you can fill them and stack them on a shelf like a book and always know where everything is. I already put more in my cart. They seem well made and fairly sturdy. I will be using them for electronic cords, supplements, toys, baking supplies, craft supplies, scarfs and everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly Bean

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I need it for. Have to carry a clear bag at my job for security reasons and it keeps my stuff together and is great quality for the price. Also arrived on time so that’s always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag to keep a very big manual dry
customer_reviews.text: I was asked for a container to hold a very important manual and to protect it from water / dust at a construction office. Eventhough this is not the purpose of this bag it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Son Goku

customer_reviews.title: Love the clear tote
customer_reviews.text: Based on some of the reviews, I thought this would be a 1 or 2 time use than throw it away. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the plastic. I will be able to use this many times in the future and all for under $10.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, it fits under the seats
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to take to the local stadium when we attend their events. Anything there you have to have this time of bag, so we've used ours several times. I use one as a purse/diaper bag, but the other I keep in my car as a spare just in case bag. So far so good, it fits under the seats, or between them and stays out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Liz C

customer_reviews.title: Great Stadium Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag meets US Open Golf and NFL requirements for bringing items onto the grounds/stadium. Don't know why I waited so long to get one. Pretty sturdy and I added a cardboard bottom to give it some support when placing the bag down (this was mentioned in a previous review).
customer_reviews.author: CADGenius

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in size, construction and space when you need a see-through bag
customer_reviews.text: These purses are very sturdy (I ordered two) and they fit the stadium requirements of being see-through. I really like how the construction is completed, especially on the handles, these were comfortable to hold and were big enough to hold exactly what I needed to hold. Really nice bags when you need a see-through bag, THIS is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for Essence Festival
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the Essence Festival when entering NOLA Super Dome. Dimensions are based on NFL clear bag rules. Holds lots of women's on the go gear (thin jacket, change of shoes/walking shoes, touch-up cosmetics, and anything else you can imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-in-Chief

customer_reviews.title: Great Tote!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my train/walk commute to work and it's WONDERFUL. Roomy, sturdy and, best of all, I can see what I need to grab within seconds instead of the endless "black hole" search of my fabric purse. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Great see through bag
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? Your a woman and you want to enter an event, well here it is. Cheaper than the ones that they sell at an arena or sports center and better quality here on Amazon. My wife loves this bag, when we go to sporting events with our kids. We literally just walk in, security just looks at the bag and signals her in. Very satisfied with the bag and it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college football games!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those college football games when only clear bags are allowed in the stadium. The handles are well made and we can fit everything we need in the bag (including our blanket!). Great bag for an awesome price compared to the ones sold at the field. Had mine shipped right to my son so it would be there when we met him for the game!
customer_reviews.author: L. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a football game
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for a football game that had a strict bag policy. Not a good bag for daily wear of course as it's not really high quality item but it does the job for a once in a while thing.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good for many purposes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for stadiums, but now it just lives in the back of my car with extra blankets, paper towels, various emergency supplies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SB22809

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed + super affordable
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a bag to store some stuff in my car and this fit the bill! Fits a ton of stuff and super cheap. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: ladyblack

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected on re-order
customer_reviews.text: I re-ordered this bag as the one I bought back in October is cracking and has holes in it. I was disappointed to open this package today to find that the bag shipped is much smaller than the last one I received. I clicked the re-order button so there’s no chance I ordered a different product. Bag works great for what I need but don’t expect it to last more that 2 1/2 to 3 months as the plastic will crack. Worth $5
customer_reviews.author: Heather Noles

customer_reviews.title: NFL approved
customer_reviews.text: Took this with me for the 49ers game and the quality held up great. Filled it with 3 large Aquafina water bottles, tons of snacks, my wallet and keys and there was STILL room if I needed it. No tears to the bag even with all the weight. Like the long shoulder strap to even use as a crossbody bag.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Sabbagh

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect because you can put a lot of stuff in it and be able to see what is inside just by looking outside the bag. It is perfect for work when doing bag check, quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Montes De Oca

customer_reviews.title: Great for NFL games
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for a NFL game and it was just perfect. I had no problems getting through security at the gate with this bag. It definitely holds a lot and didn't crack in 20° weather. After the game, I used it for a traveling makeup bag and it worked perfect. Although I love the bag, there is a strong plastic smell when you first open the package but it dissipates after having it out overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Raen Jayda

customer_reviews.title: See Thru Bag is needed at special events
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to attend a college football game. Security needs to see inside your bag before you enter the stadium; for your safety as well as everyone else. It was the perfect size. Can also be used for music concerts, etc. Well worth the $6.00!!!
customer_reviews.author: toothy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I work at the football stadium and this is the bag that we are allowed to carry. It is roomy and keeps all of my belongings in one place. I also notice that a lot of football and basketball fans carry this same bag. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: mswheezie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Longer looped strap that doesn’t make my thumb bend when I put it on my shoulder. Good quality plastic so far. Buy it you’ll love it. Just the right size, not too big and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: perfect for clear stadium bag
customer_reviews.text: sturdy plastic and handle stitching - love the zipper to keep items from falling out if bag is tipped over - love the ability to wear as a crossbody - handles are a good length
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Did The Job
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. It was used once to go to a concert that required this type of bag. There was no problems getting through the checkpoint. Overall I would recommend this bag if it is necessary to gain stadium access.
customer_reviews.author: The Review

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the big Game!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for professional sports games where you cannot have a purse or backpack! Nice and roomy, straps are a good length, and I love the zipper to keep everything secure and to prevent people from reaching in! Similar styles without the zipper cost more than double at the stadium...great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin_Gal37

customer_reviews.title: Stadium use
customer_reviews.text: I had to have a clear plastic bag to get into a stadium so this filled the bill. Saved me a trip to WalMart. A trip that would have cost me more because who leaves Walmart for less than $30?
customer_reviews.author: Gmafaye

product_meta.title: Clear Tote Bag NFL Stadium Approved - Handles, Shoulder Strap, Zipper Closure.
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty PVC clear tote bag with black shoulder straps and zippered top closure.
Suitable for workplaces that require clear bags and meets NFL and PGA Tournament guidelines.
Works well for travel, students who need clear lunch bags, office workers, sports, and concert fans.
Pass through security with the clear tote bag and avoid being rejected at the gate or door.
Measures 12" wide by 12" high by 6" deep to hold camera, cell phone, hat, water bottle, and more.
